scripts.cf-build: npx @opennextjs/cloudflare build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('.open-next/assets')){fs.mkdirSync('.vercel/output/static',{recursive:true});fs.cpSync('.open-next/assets','.vercel/output/static',{recursive:true}); if(fs.existsSync('.open-next/worker.js'))fs.copyFileSync('.open-next/worker.js','.vercel/output/static/_worker.js'); console.log('Successfully mapped OpenNext output to .vercel path');}"
